text: læa mla xik ahˌ di reiyk khea khna thi khea kalang yun lahmad xyu nı xal mihˌ rxb wa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng cæng khawdi kæ than dwy yahˌ ya doythi ca pen phu yunyan phcman hnung ca kxallxhˌ læa ca pen phuna læa phu raksʹa wi sung khwam brisuththi læa pen na bi khn hnung cak hmu chn thi pen khn di
